alert.note: Alert for McDonald (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 1:43PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern McDonald County through 215 PM CDT... At 142 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Grove, or 12 miles north of Jay, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Noel, Dodge and South West City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for southwestern Missouri.
